semantic_scholar.name: Semantic Scholar
semantic_scholar.description: AI-powered research tool for scientific literature
semantic_scholar.notes: Free, no API key required. Excellent for CS and AI papers.

arxiv.name: arXiv
arxiv.description: Open access repository of electronic preprints
arxiv.notes: Free, no API key required. Best for preprints in CS and robotics.

pubmed.name: PubMed
pubmed.notes: Free, no API key required. Good for healthcare and medical robotics.

crossref.name: Crossref
crossref.notes: Free, no API key required. Good for DOI resolution and metadata.

openalex.name: OpenAlex
openalex.description: Open catalog of the world's scholarly papers
openalex.notes: Free, no API key required. Comprehensive academic database.

ieee_xplore.name: IEEE Xplore
ieee_xplore.notes: Requires API key. Excellent for engineering and robotics papers.

acm_digital_library.name: ACM Digital Library
acm_digital_library.notes: Requires API key. Good for HCI and CS papers.

springer_nature.name: Springer Nature
springer_nature.notes: Requires API key. Good for multidisciplinary research.
